title: French fish soup
ingredients: ['2 tbsp olive oil', '2 leeks, trimmed and sliced', '2 tomatoes, chopped', '100g white fish fillet (such as hake or hoki)', '1.3 litres fish stock', '1 bay leaf', '3 sprigs of fresh parsley', '1 tsp turmeric', 'pinch of chilli powder', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', 'Rouille', '3 tbsp mayonnaise', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1/2 tsp tomato purée', 'few drops of brandy (optional)', 'pinch of cayenne pepper', 'or chilli powder', 'To serve', '1 small baguette', '2 tbsp olive oil', '50g Gruyère, grated']
